War movie Hollywood genre done redone many time clichéd dialogue rehashed plot over top action sequence seem unavoidable any conflict dealing large scale combat Once however war movie come along go grain brings truly original compelling story life silver screen The Civil War era Cold Mountain starring Jude Law Nicole Kidman Renée Zellweger such film Then calling Cold Mountain war movie entirely accurate True enough film open quite literally quick dirty battle sequence put Glory director Edward Zwick shame However Cold Mountain much Civil War period people time The story center around disgruntled Confederate soldier Inman played Jude Law becomes disgusted gruesome war homesick beautiful hamlet Cold Mountain North Carolina equally beautiful southern belle left behind Ada Monroe played Nicole Kidman At first glance setup appears formulaic romantic interest back home give audience enough sympathy root reluctant soldier tribulation battlefield Indeed the earlier segment the film relatively unimpressive even somewhat contrived Cold Mountain soon take a drastic turn though the intrepid hero Inman turn a deserter incidentally saving the audience the potentially confusing scenario wanting root the Confederates begin a long odyssey homeward Meanwhile back the farm Ada cultured way prove little use the field soon transformed something a wilderbeast Coming Ada rescue the course tough nail Ruby Thewes played Renée Zellweger help Ada put the farm back together perhaps importantly cope the loneliness isolation the war seems brought upon Ada Within two setting a vivid compelling at time disturbing portrait the war torn South unfolds The character whom Inman Ada interact surprisingly complex enhanced wonderful performance Brendan Gleeson Ruby deadbeat father Ray Winstone an unrepentant southern lawman Natalie Portman a deeply troubled isolated young mother All have been greatly affected changed the war Northern aggression mostly the worse The dark pervading anti war message accented an effective haunting score chillingly beautiful shot Virginia North Carolina communicated the audience not so much gruesome battle scene a the scarred land traumatized people which the war fought Though the weapon tactic war have changed much the past century s hellish effect the land timelessly relevant Director Anthony Minghella manages maintain gloomy mood most the film the atmosphere unfortunately denigrated a rather tepid climax doe little justice the wonderfully formed character The love story Inman Ada is awkwardly tacked onto the beginning end the film though the inherently distant abstracted even absurd nature their relationship a way fit the dismal nature the rest the plot Make mistake Cold Mountain ha neither the trait a feel good romance an inspiring war drama It is a unique vision an era is sure not only entertain also truly absorb the audience the life a people torn apart by a war entirely desperate to be rid it terrible repercussion altogether

Ardh Satya one finest film ever made Indian Cinema Directed great director Govind Nihalani one successful Hard Hitting Parallel Cinema also turned Commercial Success Even today Ardh Satya inspiration leading director India The film tell Real life Scenario Mumbai Police Unlike Police other city India Mumbai Police encompasses Different system altogether Govind Nihalani creates very practical Outlay real life approach Mumbai Police Environment Amongst various Police officer colleague film describes story Anand Velankar a young hot blooded Cop coming a poor family His father a harsh Police Constable Anand suffers father ideology incidence father Atrocities his mother Anand approach towards immediate action crime an inert craving his Job satisfaction The film here revolved a Plot wherein Anand constant effort crime trampled his senior This lead frustration not achieve the desired Job satisfaction Resulting the frustration his anger expressed excessive violence the remand room bar also turning an alcoholic The Spirit within still alive he constantly fight the system He aware the system the Metro the Police Politicians a inertly associated far end His compromise towards unethical practice negative Finally he get suspended The Direction a master piece thoroughly hard core One the best memorable scene when Anand break the Underworld gangster Rama Shetty house to arrest followed short conversation is fantastic At many scene the film Hair raising moment The Practical approach Script is a major Punch Alcoholism Corruption Political Influence Courage Deceptions all integral part Mumbai police even today Those aspect are dealt brilliantly Finally the film belongs to the One man show Om Puri portraying Anand Velankar traversing all his emotion absolutely brilliantly

Kane newsreel representing Ralston Henry Luce clone Thatcher memoir Bernstein Jed Leland Susan Alexander Kane Raymond butler Each different slant Kane reflecting faith disappointment hatred man And course also reveals or own failing telling version Kane story This method also lead frequent overlapping telling incident This not situation THE POWER AND THE GLORY Yes like KANE legendary business leader Tom Garner Spencer Tracy man rose bottom being head successful railroad system country But two narrator are Garner right hand man Henry Ralph Morgan wife Sarah Padden This restricts nearly three dimensional view get time Kane Garner Henry narrates talking bos friend respected loved His wife like the voice the skeptical public see the flaw Henry Typical example Although worked way Tom becomes anti labor his later year Unions are troublemaker not care slowed shenanigan Henry describes Tom confrontation the Union major walk preoccupied the detriment his home life But Henry wife reminds how Tom used scab violence end the strike apparently blowing the Union headquarters killing many people So have two view the man one pure white one pure black I not really knocking THE POWER AND THE GLORY not duplicating KANE success film including Orson Welles film I aware the story presented well enough hold one interest the end And thanks the performance Tracy Colleen Moore his wife Tom get deeply involved running the railroad empire he expands improves constantly But take away home much and he loses touch Sally And he also notice Eve Helen Vinson the younger woman becomes his mistress When Sally learns his unfaithful behavior destroys her Similarly Tom get full shock make martyr the eye Henry Eve marries Tom and present a son it turn be Eve son by Tom son Tom Jr Philip his Board Directors about his plan to purchase a small rival train line and he discus the use debenture financing the plan Sturgis came a wealthy background he could bring this type of detail So on the whole it is a first rate film No CITIZEN KANE perhaps of interest to movie lover an attempt business realism with social commentary Depression America

flee California attempt start new life running dance school young talented girl Particularly Adelle adapts perfectly new environment fall love with a local millionaire poor old Helen continues sink a In director Walt Disney animator Ub Iwerks changed face animation release first installment Silly Symphonies series The Skeleton Dance Iwerks Disney collaborating together since early Disney Laugh O Gram cartoon series however friendship suffered tremendous blow Iwerks accepted offer competitor leave Disney start own animation studio That birth Celebrity Productions Iwerks continued developing style technique created character Flip Frog While work kept same high quality wasn really popular studio closed Later year Iwerks hired Columbia Pictures Iwerks decided return his old skeleton another dance time color Skeleton Frolics essentially remake classic The Skeleton Dance movie borough fame fortune Like short film set abandoned graveyard where midnight creature night come alive begin play The dead rise their coffin ready show begin group skeleton formed an orchestra begin play happy tune Now easy musician made bone some orchestra member problem their body part however band manages put good show another group skeleton begin dance A lovely couple them face same problem troubled orchestra hard dance loose body part Everything end at dawn sun rise skeleton run towards their graf Directed animated Ub Iwerks Skeleton Frolics follows faithfully pattern set The Skeleton Dance year although crucial difference Iwerks the whole film in Technicolor The bright tonality allowed Iwerks create visually appealing film also use the many new technique had been practicing since leaving Disney creating even better effect depth dynamism those conceived It certainly more experimental film The Skeleton Dance although sadly doesn mean necessarily better film For starter the film practically identical the one Disney the difference the music more on later the color effect It look beautiful doubt definitely feel kind unoriginal all However the unoriginality the concept truly hurt the film all Iwerks executes in wonderful way the fact the musical melody created Joe DeNat the film pretty uninteresting lack the charming elegance whimsical fun the one done by Carl W Stalling The Skeleton Dance In word DeNat tune effective appropriate the theme easy forget about rapidly Stalling song a unique personality make it unforgettable Being a musical film is high importance so the mediocrity the music brings Iwerk flawless work animation Personally I think with a better musical accompaniment Skeleton Frolics would remembered fondly The Skeleton Dance despite being groundbreaking it s still a fun film watch It s kind sad most the work Iwerks did after leaving Disney is now forgotten due his poor success however it must be said if Iwerks lacked the popularity Disney Fleischer Disney s main rival did lack the quality those company film It probably just a case bad luck made the man gave life Disney s mouse the first time to face failure Disney Despite shortcoming Skeleton Frolics is a funny visually breathtaking film exactly the most original fresh film one just can help thinking of The Skeleton Dance while watching it it definitely reminds u Iwerk s skeleton still to haunt u inspire u

enthralled year old niece Amber loving able appreciate star power Frankie Jonas Noah Cyrus year old nephew Aaron review course good Everything Miyazaki san good year old animation fan brought tear powerful directing gorgeous animation er would me year old woman mother able connect mother character I betting older chara loving cuteness child character And I respect most Miyazaki san He seems speak audience completely different way average filmmaker On surface Ponyo could seen simple story about a little fish girl get a taste human world want join friend make a little boy name Soske somewhat like The Little Mermaid there entire different level play True form Miyazaki populates film intensely strong female character Ponyo Mother Soske mother older lady a nursing home all genuine character mind their extremely strong willed But girl take cake Ponyo Once decides like human world simply us own achieve dream Her father trying keep innocent keep a magical fish young Ponyo know want becomes human simply own determination Once human she team friend Soske she love much although maybe much ham Soske asked man house age five mother Lisa decides she help people at rest home she work a typhoon ha inadvertently caused Ponyo quest become human Frankie Jonas yes He related the Jonas brother Can just get past please give perhaps the best performance the film a young Soske good since ha the most line His character also strong willed also respectful friendly characteristic you re likely find a child character THIS side the Pacific In the end Ponyo father Fujimoto must cope his daughter decision his estranges wife wish allow her be human He hope Ponyo Soske will remember fondly And again Miyazaki REFUSES allow a character become the stereotypical bad guy Although Miyazaki ha reason received criticism this is honestly make his movie magical yet relatable No one real life is completely a bad person All human various shade of gray And is exactly Miyazaki his character And then there the animation In a time CGI would certainly have helped with the copious amount of effect shot this film especially the water Miyazaki ha chosen incorporate NO CGI whatsoever Certainly the hand drawn animation colored digital mean every film this hand drawn I one wa extremely grateful The character animation wa extremely fluid and there even appeared be lip sync going Ab Tak Chhappan fictitious story surrounding police department Mumbai India Sadhu Agashe a hard working hard edged cop heading a plain clothed crime squad make a name himself killing dangerous criminal staged police encounter rather locking prison His loyal officer obey without question a rift form one his officer Imtiaz becomes frustrated Sadhu high ranking status secretly competing criminal kill status A new recruit also pushed fraternity Imtiaz angry Sadhu allows him take lead his first case Further change come form a new police commissioner disapproves Sadhu tactic everyone get caught in internal politics I surprised to see a well directed action thriller coming India The camera work excellent story well told tension high the drama unfolds The acting pace political subterfuge convinces the viewer they a fly the wall witnessing the blood sweat tear a close up personal view and the event based reality doubt we told is not the beginning the film although it is likely that the director Shimit Amin taken liberty factual account Nevertheless Ab Tak Chhappan is an extremely polished piece film making
